Audio.Locality: 10 km S Pocone on Transpantaneira, Mato Grosso
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Natural song of a bird about 5-12m up in short-stature semi-evergreen woodland.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Herpsilochmus longirostris,Tolmomyias sulphurescens,Synallaxis albilora,Crypturellus undulatus,Basileuterus culicivorus,Conirostrum speciosum,Galbula ruficauda
